description: ff. 187. 207 x 155; 155 x 78 mm. 23 lin. 17th/18th cen. collated with a copy written by the authorʼs son Muḥammad Tāj al-Dīn, dat. Ramaḍān 1014. Glossary of legal and theological terms: Brockelmann, GAL, II, 394 (no. 10); S II, 417. Incip.: ... الحمد لله الذى من تعرف الىه
author: Munāwī, ʻAbd al-Raʼūf ibn Tāj al-ʻĀrifīn, -1621
title: al-Tawqīf ʻalá muhimmāt al-taʻārīf.
creator: Munāwī, ʻAbd al-Raʼūf ibn Tāj al-ʻĀrifīn, -1621
subject: Islamic law—Dictionaries—Arabic—Early works to 1800
